text: yeeonjayeo neohui sujung-e issneun polodeul-ege illeo galodoe hananim i neohui ma-eumsog-eseo mid-eum-ui jinli leul balgyeonhal ttae neohuiege bog-eum-eul julini ineun neohuiga ilh-eun geosboda na-eumyeo neohuiege gwan-yong-eul bepul-eo jusil geos-ila hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa ja bilo chungmanhasinila
